summary.para: Gets an attribute store for the media source.

param.name: ppAttributes
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The media source does not support source-level attributes.

remarks.para: Use the pointer to get or set attributes that apply to the entire source. For stream-level attributes, use the method instead.

summary.para: Gets an attribute store for a stream on the media source.

param.name: dwStreamIdentifier
param.para: The identifier of the stream. To get the identifier, call on the stream descriptor.

param.name: ppAttributes
param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The media source does not support stream-level attributes.

remarks.para: Use the pointer to get or set attributes that apply to the specified stream. For attributes that apply to the entire source, use the method instead.

summary.para: Sets a pointer to the Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI) Device Manager on the media source.

param.name: pManager
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the DXGI Manager. The media source should query this pointer for the interface.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The media source does not support source-level attributes.

summary.para: Extends the interface to provide additional capabilities for a media source.
To get a pointer to this interface, call on the media source.

remarks.para: Implementations of this interface can return E_NOTIMPL for any methods that are not required by the media source.
